titleSection.name: VersionOne CodeStream
titleSection.shortDescription: The channel to agile code traceability

descriptionSection.description:
## VersionOne CodeStream solution for version control systems

* A new way to connect to your preferred version control tools
* Flexibility to support multiple version control tools without installing on-premise, point-to-point integrations 
* Simply activate the hosted service and VersionOne takes care of the rest
* Aggregate summaries from multiple repositories in a single digest

earlyaccess.shortDescription: Early access build. Use with caution.
